item.title: Cats vs Dogs Classification
item.description: Image classification exercise I’m not gonna lie. I’m more of a dog person. Better know how to tell the difference. ðŸ˜‚ Here we go. Introduction This is an Image classification exercise. I will play with an expired Kaggle competition. The code is available in a jupyter notebook here. You will need to download the data from the Kaggle competition. https://www.kaggle.com/c/dogs-vs-cats/. The dataset contains 25,000 images of dogs and cats (12,500 from each class).
